channel.title: Post Count reduced?
channel.description:
It appears since 2007 I have lost my postcount, either that or I am currently on the wrong account. I know I haven't been in the scene for a few years however I do know that I was both an active member here and on another forum.
Regardless, I have returned and I look forward to spreading the knowledge that I have gained over the years to those whom are just getting into it, or have been for awhile.

item.title: Post Count reduced?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I can see your old posts are in the MITB Trash can from 2007, probably cant restore them because of the merge where the sections got deleted.

Read full topic
